metadata.dc:description: This paper describes the first three Salmonella Zaiman cases in children of more than one year old with acute infectious diarrhoea of less than seven days evolution, in the Pediatric Department of R. Madariaga Hospital in Posadas, Misiones. This sero-variety was isolated by hemoculture in an 11 year old girl with urinary infection and sepsis. This Salmonella is a new sero-variety isolated from Zaiman river which flows through suburbs of Posadas.
metadata.dc:title: Primeros aislamientos de Salmonella Zaiman en humanos.
[The first isolations of Salmonella Zaiman in humans].
